name: Samsung 55" Class Crystal UHD U8000F 4K Smart TV (2025 Model)
pros: Excellent 4K picture quality and upscaling for the price
Elegant, sleek design with a metal build and slim bezels
Access to thousands of free channels via Samsung TV Plus
Strong security features with Samsung Knox
Easy to set up and use
cons: Sound quality is frequently criticized; external speakers are highly recommended
Multiple user reports of remote control malfunctions or failures
Higher-than-average number of reports of units arriving with broken screens
Basic HDR support (not specifically HDR10+ or Dolby Vision)
Limited gaming features compared to other models
